hero.title: Mathematics of Life
hero.subtitle: Science-based data science and AI consulting for agriculture, ecology, and environmental research

service1.title: Predictive Modeling & Workflows
service1.description: Advanced statistical models and machine learning pipelines for investigating patterns and predicting outcomes in living systems.
service1.keywords: Machine learning, dose-response modeling, time series analysis, neural networks

service2.title: Interactive Scientific Applications
service2.description: Custom web applications that transform complex analyses into accessible tools for researchers, farmers, and decision-makers.
service2.keywords: Web applications, dashboards, data visualization, scientific computing

service3.title: Statistics
service3.description: Transform repetitive analytical tasks in advanced statistics into automated workflows.
service3.keywords: Automation, reproducible research, statistical computing, workflow optimization

home.reachOut: If you want to get in touch with me about something or just to say hi, reach out on social media or send me an email.
